channel.title: How to make mod only shops
channel.description:
hey there used to be a tut on this but it got wiped :(
all I need is the one line of code because I don't know how to format it. Isn't it something like
[code]if playerRights >= 2{ wanneshop = 40}[/code]
I don't know can someone post the code? thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 11:48:05 PM[/size][hr]lol nobody knows? :(
